tasks.name: Phase 1: Backend Development
tasks.description: Initial phase focusing on setting up the backend environment and API endpoints.
tasks.completion_criteria: Setting up of Flask/FastAPI, creating basic endpoints for listings.

sub_tasks.name: Set up Python environment
sub_tasks.description: Install Python, Flask or FastAPI, and other necessary dependencies.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Python and Flask/FastAPI are installed and verified.

sub_tasks.name: Implement scraping logic
sub_tasks.description: Write scripts to scrape data from liquidation websites using BeautifulSoup or Scrapy.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Scraping scripts are able to fetch listings successfully.

sub_tasks.name: Select web scraping library
sub_tasks.description: Choose a library (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) and set it up for scraping.

sub_tasks.name: Develop scraping scripts
sub_tasks.description: Create scripts that scrape listings from liquidation.com and other sources.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Scraping scripts are tested and functional.

sub_tasks.name: Develop API endpoints
sub_tasks.description: Create API endpoints for serving scraped listings and individual item details.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Endpoints for listing and item details are functional.

tasks.name: Phase 2: Integration with eBay API
tasks.description: Integrating with eBay API to fetch selling history for items in the liquidation listings.
tasks.completion_criteria: Successful retrieval of eBay listing data.

sub_tasks.name: Implement eBay API integration
sub_tasks.description: Create scripts to fetch item selling history from eBay.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: eBay selling data is fetched successfully.

sub_tasks.name: Create endpoints for eBay data
sub_tasks.description: Implement API endpoints to query and retrieve eBay selling history data.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Endpoints for eBay data retrieval are created and functional.

tasks.name: Phase 3: Value Analysis
tasks.description: Develop algorithms to assess the value of items and listings based on historical data.
tasks.completion_criteria: Algorithms and endpoints for value analysis are implemented.

sub_tasks.name: Develop value analysis algorithms
sub_tasks.description: Create algorithms that analyze eBay data to determine item values.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Value assessment algorithm is functional and accurate.

sub_tasks.name: Implement value analysis endpoints
sub_tasks.description: Create API endpoints to analyze and assess values of listings and items.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Endpoints for value analysis are created and functional.

tasks.name: Phase 4: Testing and Documentation
tasks.description: Testing all functionalities and documenting the API with Swagger/OpenAPI.
tasks.completion_criteria: All tests pass, and API documentation is complete.

sub_tasks.name: Write unit tests
sub_tasks.description: Create unit tests for individual functions and methods in the code.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: All unit tests are written and passing.

sub_tasks.name: Write integration tests
sub_tasks.description: Write tests to ensure that different components of the application work together as expected.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: All integration tests are written and passing.

sub_tasks.name: Document API
sub_tasks.description: Use Swagger/OpenAPI to document the API endpoints and their usage.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: API documentation is comprehensive and published.

tasks.name: Phase 1: Environment Setup
tasks.description: Set up the development environment for the project.
tasks.completion_criteria: Python environment is set up successfully.

sub_tasks.name: Set up Python environment
sub_tasks.description: Create and configure the Python virtual environment for the project.
sub_tasks.completion_criteria: Python environment is configured and dependencies are installed.
